name: validate cart data

testSteps.description: Given the user is on the page https://www.linio.com.co/
When the user selects the Home category and then the section Mattresses, bed bases and pillows.
When the user selects the product "Super Mega Combo Azul Queen 160x190 Resortado Marshall" "3"
Then the user click on add to cart

children.description: Laura clicks on go to cart

testSteps.description: And the user should see in the cart the product, the quantity and the new value match the total of products
